Created attachment 23142
Test file showing the problem

XSL-FO 1.1 explicitly states [1] that an fo:table-row may have zero or more fo:marker elements as its initial children, yet FOP throws a validation exception in such a situation:
org.apache.fop.fo.ValidationException: "{http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Format}marker" is not a valid child of "fo:table-row"! (See position 23:60)


[1] http://www.w3.org/TR/xsl11/#fo_table-row

Note: although FObj.addMarker() also checks for possible preceding nodes, followed the same approach as the other table objects. Makes sense to bail out early here.
